column3: This field is used to record the type of measurement that the dimension of the documented physical information carrier represents.
column5: This field is used to record the type of measurement that the dimension of the documented object represents.

column3: This field is used to record the value of the measured dimension of the documented physical information carrier.
column5: This field is used to record the value of the measured dimension of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to record the unit of the measured dimension of the documented physical information carrier.
column5: This field is used to record the unit of the measured dimension of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to record the actor who undertook the measurement producing the dimension of the documented physical information carrier.
column5: This field is used to record the actor who undertook the measurement producing the dimension of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to record the material of which the documented physical information carrier consists.
column5: This field is used to record the material of which the documented physical object consists.

column3: This field is used to record the technique used in the production of the documented physical information carrier.
column5: This field is used to record the technique used in the production of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to indicate the recto or verso status of the feature of the documented physical information carrier.
column5: This field is used to indicate the recto or verso status of the feature of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to enable a free text description of the recto or verso feature of the documented physical information carrier.
column5: This field is used to enable a free text description of the recto or verso feature of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to link the recto or verso feature of the documented physical information carrier to an instance of digital object which represents it.
column5: This field is used to link the recto or verso feature of the documented object to an instance of digital object which represents it.

column3: This field is used to link to  linguistic object which is the transcription of the text carried on the recto or verso feature of the documented physical information carrier.
column5: This field is used to link to  linguistic object which is the transcription of the text carried on the recto or verso feature of the documented object.
